will be the Mountain View Internet juggernaut's new CEO starting April 4, and current CEO Eric Schmidt will be executive chairman, Eric Schmidt revealed in a post today on Google's blog. Co-founder Sergey Brin , meanwhile, has decided to devote his time and energy to strategic projects, in particular working on new products. His title will be co-founder.
